attributes.action: Emergency Vehicles Using Bus lanes at any time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister or Government should act and step in to exempt all types of emergency vehicles whether Fire, Police, Ambulance including NHS, Voluntary or Private to use bus lanes in connection with carring out their duties whether non-urgent, uegent or in an emegency. As at present I understand that if the vehicle is on an emergency they can, but this is a grey are with some police and local councils.
